en.content_intro_text: At Rural Retreats, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data.
en.content_info_text: We collect the following types of information when you use our services:
en.content_info_text3: Cookies and usage data for improving our website
en.content_info_use_text3: Sending promotional offers and travel updates
en.content_info_sharing_text: We do not sell your data. Your information is shared only with:
en.content_info_sharing_text3: Legal authorities if required by law
en.content_data_text: We implement strong security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access.
en.content_rights_text: You have the right to request access, correction, or deletion of your personal data. To do so, email us at support@ruralretreats.com.
en.content_privacy_changes_text: We may update this policy from time to time. Please check this page for the latest version.
en.content_contact_text: If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy, contact us at support@ruralretreats.com.
en.footer_about: We offer budget-friendly tours, curated travel experiences, and luxury escapes worldwide.
en.footer_address: Address: Q University Institute Of Technology, Burdwan-713104, West Bengal
en.footer_rights: ┬й 2025 Rural Retreats. All rights reserved. | Privacy Policy | Terms & Conditions

fr.content_intro_text: Chez Rural Retreats, nous respectons votre vie priv├йe et nous nous engageons ├а prot├йger vos donn├йes personnelles.
